messages.original:
Last night, a series of Geran-2 drone strikes were carried on Zaporizhzhia City. At least 14 impacts were recorded in two waves, primarily targeting industrial infrastructure and warehouses. 
Ukrainian air defence has become more active in Zaporizhzhia lately. Previously the anti-air fire was more chaotic, but lately there is a clear 10-15 seconds of shooting, followed by an explosion from the Geran hitting its target or getting shot down. It has become more coordinated, going after specific targets, resulting in more interceptions. This change in tactics suggests that new mobile air defence crews have been brought into the city.

Last night, a series of Geran-2 drone strikes were carried on Zaporizhzhia City. At least 14 impacts were recorded in two waves, primarily targeting industrial infrastructure and warehouses. 
Ukrainian air defence has become more active in Zaporizhzhia lately. Previously the anti-air fire was more chaotic, but lately there is a clear 10-15 seconds of shooting, followed by an explosion from the Geran hitting its target or getting shot down. It has become more coordinated, going after specific targets, resulting in more interceptions. This change in tactics suggests that new mobile air defence crews have been brought into the city.

A combined missile and drone attack was carried out on Kremenchuk, Poltava Oblast, last night. At least 30 Geran-2 drones and as many as 4 Iskander-K cruise missiles impacted various targets.
Among the targets hit was the Kremenchuk Railway Depot and its electrical substation (49.087513, 33.452945). Multiple large fires are now burning there.
Additionally, as seen in the first video, 2 Russian Geran-2 drones impacted the middle section of the Kryukovsky Bridge over the Dnipro River. Minor damage was recorded.

A combined missile and drone attack was carried out on Kremenchuk, Poltava Oblast, last night. At least 30 Geran-2 drones and as many as 4 Iskander-K cruise missiles impacted various targets.
Among the targets hit was the Kremenchuk Railway Depot and its electrical substation (49.087513, 33.452945). Multiple large fires are now burning there.
Additionally, as seen in the first video, 2 Russian Geran-2 drones impacted the middle section of the Kryukovsky Bridge over the Dnipro River. Minor damage was recorded.

New footage showing two Russian Iskander-K cruise missile strikes on a warehouse complex in Kyiv, this morning. The complex is already burning, and what appears to be an interceptor missile can be seen self-destructing on approach.

The city of Kryvyi Rih, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, was attacked by 6 Iskander-M ballistic missiles and over a dozen Geran-2 drones last night. Strong explosions rocked the city, and fires were recorded burning afterwards. 
The main targets were industrial enterprises, but the exact targets are unknown.

The city of Kryvyi Rih, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, was attacked by 6 Iskander-M ballistic missiles and over a dozen Geran-2 drones last night. Strong explosions rocked the city, and fires were recorded burning afterwards. 
The main targets were industrial enterprises, but the exact targets are unknown.
Starokostyantyniv Airbase in Khmelnytskyi Oblast was also targeted by at least 20 Gerans, but naturally there are no videos or photos.

Thank God for Ukraine's massively effective air defence shooting down 747 drones last night. But seriously, why is it only Ukraine's government that people are inclined to believe when it comes to unsubstantiated wartime claims... the government that has a long history of lies?

Russian forces have captured the village of Novoselivka, Pokrovske direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~295.
Total land area: ~0.92 km¬≤.

Close-up of the damage to the bridge in Kremenchuk after it was hit by two Russian Geran-2 drones yesterday. The damage is minor, as the drones hit the top part of the frame.
Close-up of the damage to the bridge in Kremenchuk after it was hit by two Russian Geran-2 drones yesterday. The damage is minor, as the drones hit the top part of the frame.
Kyiv and the region is currently under a large-scale Russian Geran-2 drone attack. The Trypillia Thermal Power Plant is the main target.

What section of the frontline would you like me to make a long form analysis on, and why? I recently did one on the future of Pokrovske-Prosyana, and how that could influence the battle of Hulyaipole.
Around 20 Geran-2 drones are currently flying over Chernihiv and Poltava, heading towards Kyiv, most likely aiming for Trypillia again
